<style type=\"text/css\">
	body {
		font-size: 16px;
		font-weight: normal;
		margin:0;
		padding:0;
	}

	/************ BEGIN THEMES ************/
	/*** THEME: DARK ***/
	body#darkTheme {
		color: #CCC;
	}
	body#darkTheme a:link, a:active, a:hover {
		color: #E1E1E1;
	}
	body#darkTheme a:visited {
		color: #FFF;
	}

	/*** THEME: LIGHT ***/
	body#lightTheme {
		color: #3A3931;
	}
	body#lightTheme a:link, a:active, a:hover {
		color: #555;
	}
	body#lightTheme a:visited {
		color: #000;
	}

	/*** THEME: BLACK ***/
	body#blackTheme {
		color: #CCC;
	}
	body#blackTheme a:link, a:active, a:hover {
		color: #E1E1E1;
	}
	body#blackTheme a:visited {
		color: #FFF;
	}

	/*** THEME: WHITE ***/
	body#whiteTheme {
		color: #3A3931;
	}
	body#whiteTheme a:link, a:active, a:hover {
		color: #555;
	}
	body#whiteTheme a:visited {
		color: #000;
	}
	/************ END THEMES ************/

	body, blockquote, img, iframe, video, div, table, tbody, tr, td, pre, code, p, em, b {
		width: auto;
		height: auto;
		max-width: 100%;
	}
	pre, code, blockquote, p, em, b {
		white-space: -moz-pre-wrap;
		white-space: -pre-wrap;
		white-space: -o-pre-wrap;
		/* used to be pre-wrap but I dont know why and it breaks align_justify */
		white-space: normal;
	}
	pre, code, blockquote {
		white-space: pre-wrap;
	}
	blockquote {
		border-left: 2px solid #999;
	}
	#note {
		border: 2px dotted yellow;
	}
	#subscription, #datetime, #author, #labels {
		font-size: 11px;
	}
	#subscription {
		float: left;
	}
	#datetime {
		float: right;
	}
	#author, #labels {
	}
	#zierleiste {
		height: 1px;
	}
	#content {
		text-align: $TEXT_ALIGN$;
	}
	#content table {
		width: 100%;
		table-layout: fixed;
	}
	#attachments {
		font-size: 11px;
		text-align: right;
		color: #04B404;
	}
</style>
